name: Dagoma DiscoEasy200 Bicolor

extruders.select:
;Start T0
M83
G1 E{retraction_amount} F3000
G1 E60 F3000
G1 E-{retraction_amount} F5000
M82
G92 E0
extruders.deselect:
M83
G1 E-{retraction_amount} F10000
G1 E1.5 F3000
G1 E-60 F10000
M82
G92 E0
;End T0

pre_gcode: ;Begin Start Gcode for Dagoma DiscoEasy 200 Bicolor
G28 X Y ;Home stop X Y
G1 X100 ;Centre back during cooldown in case of oozing
; PLEASE CHECK: M109 R{material_standby_temperature} ;Cooldown in case too hot
G0 X100 Y5 Z0.5 ;Front centre for degunk
;Finish Start Gcode for Dagoma DiscoEasy 200 Bicolor
post_gcode: ;Begin End Gcode for Dagoma DiscoEasy 200 Bicolor
G1 E-3 F5000 ;Retract filament to stop oozing
; PLEASE CHECK: M109 R{material_standby_temperature} ;Wait until head has cooled to standby temp
;Finish End Gcode for Dagoma DiscoEasy 200 Bicolor
